mapper.select:
select t.* from t_user t
and t.user_name like '%${userName}%'
and t.email like '%${email}%'
and t.phone like '%${phone}%'
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (user_name, user_pwd, true_name, email, phone, is_valid, create_date) values (#{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{trueName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{isValid}, #{createDate})
mapper.update: update t_user set user_name = #{userName}, true_name = #{trueName}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, update_date = #{updateDate} where id = #{id}
